trans-unit.source: You are about to add a note to 's profile.
The note will be visible to other 121 users who are permitted to view personal profiles.
Tip: Press Command / Ctrl + Enter to submit.
Project not found. Please check the URL and try again.
Registration not found. Please check the URL and try again.
There are no records that match the selected filters, clear some or all filters to continue.

trans-unit.note: The contents of the square brackets should not be touched/changed

trans-unit.source: The new password must be at least 8 characters long.
The new password must be different from the current password.
The confirm password must be equal to the new password.
Necessary cookies are required for the basic operation of the platform.
They do not require explicit consent, and by using our website, you agree to their use. However, you may still manage or block these cookies via your browser settings.

Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. If you wish to disable cookies, please refer to your browser's help section. Note that disabling necessary cookies may affect the website's functionality.
If you have any questions about our use of necessary cookies, please feel free to contact us at:
Use your work email to log in.
Total registrations excluding rejected and deleted registrations.
Amount of payments done in the project so far.
Cash distributed in the last payment.
No PowerBI dashboard has been configured for this project, please contact support@121.global to set this up

The base transfer value is multiplied by a set factor for each registration. For example, if the base value is $50 and the multiplier is based on household size, a 3-person household would receive $150 per payment.
You're about to pause debit card number .
A message will be sent to the registration about this update.
You're about to unpause debit card number .
Custom messages are not automatically translated to the registration's preferred language.
Note that if you go over 160 characters the Person affected may receive the message as multiple texts, if they have a feature-(non-smart-)phone.
*Please make sure registration data is available for all used personalized fields.
Are you sure you want to send this message?
The message must be at least 20 characters long.
Use the 'Last Message Status' column to check the progress of messages. Closing this notification will not cancel message sending.
Select one or more registrations and try again.
* Leaving this field empty means the team member will have access to all PAs
* To use a subscope type a dot between the scope and subscope (e.g. amsterdam.west)
Enter a valid scope. No spaces are allowed.
An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
You're about to remove () from your team.They will not have access to the project anymore.
You are not assigned to any project(s) yet, contact the admin/supervisor to start using the 121 portal.
You're about to reset 's password. The user will receive an email with the new password sent to their registered email address. Only proceed if the user has requested this action.
Invalid email or password. Double-check your credentials and try again.
Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
Select a message from the template messages or write a custom message.
You're about to send a message to registration(s).
There has been no export yet.
This might take a few minutes. The file will be automatically downloaded when ready. Closing this notification will not cancel the export.
Latest export has been done on:
You're about to download an Excel file for selected registrations.
You're about to download an Excel file for all duplicate registrations.
You're about to download an Excel file for all status & data changes.
Optionally pass a start date and/or an end date to filter the data changes. The export is limited to 100,000 data changes. Adapt your dates if needed.
The data in this report is based on data that is imported every night from CBE. If you changed data today this will not be reflected in the report.
You're about to download an Excel file with all of the registrations included in the last payment(s).
This will download an Excel file showing the balance of every card from the last payment(s).
Important Notice: The unused vouchers available for download are not in real-time. The report includes the date and time of each voucher's last external update.
Important Notice: The card balances available for download are not in real-time. The report includes the date and time of each card's last external update.
This will download an Excel file with all unused voucher(s).
There is currently no data to export
There are no payments for this project yet.
The following message will be sent to each registration in their language.
I understand this action can not be undone.
The action "Include" can only be applied to registrations who’s “Payments left” is larger than 0. Registrations with 0 payments left will remain with their current status.
Select registrations with the status “included” and try again.
This action can not be undone. Are you sure you want to delete these registrations?
The action "Delete" can not be applied to registrations with the "Completed" status.
Would you like to proceed with registration(s)?
The action "Pause" can only be applied to registrations with the "Included" status. Registrations with other statuses will remain with their current status.
This action can not be applied to the registrations you have selected.
The action "Delete" can not be applied to registrations with the "Completed" status. Registrations with “completed” status will remain with their current status.
The action "Pause" can only be applied to registrations with the "Included" status.
Select registrations who's “Payments left” is larger than 0 and try again.
The action "Validate" can only be applied to registrations with the "Registered" status. Registrations with other statuses will remain with their current status.
The action "Validate" can only be applied to registrations with the "Registered" status.
The action "Decline" can not be applied to registrations with the "Completed" status. Registrations with “completed” status will remain with their current status.
This means that they will not be included in payments.
The action "Decline" can not be applied to registrations with the "Completed" status.
There are registration(s) that don't support this action
This means that they can be included in payments.
They will not be included in payments.
Select registrations with other status and try again.
Select registrations with another status and try again.
The action "Include" can only be applied to registrations who's “Payments left” is larger than 0.
Select registrations with the status “Registered” and try again.
You must select this to proceed.
The status of registration(s) is being changed to "" successfully. The status change can take up to a minute to process.
The system will create registrations with the status “registered”.
The import takes about 1 minute per 100 records
Make sure to match the required format of the template CSV-file. Download the template here.
Something went wrong with this import. Please fix the errors reported below and try again.
Payment not found. Please check the URL and try again.
Unknown user account or authentication failed
The total payment amount is calculated by summing up the transfer values of each included registration added to the payment.
A payment is currently in progress. Please wait until it has finished.
Some of the registrations you have selected are not eligible for this payment. Change your selection and try again
Review summary and click start payment.
Review payment summary and follow the next steps:
Click start payment, this will direct you to the payment page.
Upload the file to the Financial Service Provider’s portal.
Save the exported XLSX-file in the format required by the Financial Service Provider.
Export the FSP instructions from the payment page. This is only possible once the payment is no longer in progress.
Below is a table of all registrations. Select registrations you would like to add to this payment.
Please allow pop-up windows in your browser settings to login
You're about to replace debit card number . This will block the current card and a new card will be issued.
You do not have permission to view this page.
You are about to retry payment(s). The transfer status will change to Pending until received by the registration.
You're about to download an Excel file with all of the registrations included in this payment.
You're about to download an Excel file with the FSP instructions for this payment.
Import the file sent by the FSP to see the transfer status of the registrations included in this payment. Download the template here.
The status column in the file should contain one of the following values:
Make sure to upload the correct file as this will override the current file.
A payment is currently in progress. Please try again later
The payment will be in progress while the number of transfers sent, total amount and registrations in the table below are loading.
There are no registrations in this project yet. For information about importing registrations to your project check out the 121 Manual .
There are no records to display.
This field is dynamically generated based on the other name fields available below:
Value does not match the required pattern:
Write a reason for the update
Please fill out all required fields.
The maximum number of payments for this Person Affected. You can remove the limit by removing the value and saving.
The transfer value will be multiplied by this number for this Person Affected
The required format is: ONLY numbers, including country-code.
Separate the parts with a dot (i.e. 'amsterdam.west').
Changes that you made may not be saved. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
This is automatically calculated based on Max. payments and payments sucessfully sent
We couldn't find any information linked to this person's phone number in the projects you have access to on the 121 Platform.
When you receive a task, any information linked to the person's phone number found in active programs in the 121 Platform will appear here.
Use the arrow keys or W A S D to play the game
The data of the 121 Platform is hosted in a Microsoft Azure-environment of The Netherlands Red Cross.
Your e-mail address and/or your (full) name.
We only use necessary cookies to be able to let users log in to the 121 Platform. These cookies are not used to track any (returning) use of the 121 Platform over time.
We retain your e-mail address for as long as a project/program is stored on the 121 Platform.
We retain your e-mail address and name for as long as you are a user associated with a project/program on the 121 Platform.
We don't store your IP-address. We only use it to generate an anonymous identifier not linked to any personal information.
This identifier is stored for max. 90 days in our logs-storage.
Information you or your employer has provided us.
This privacy notice tells you what to expect us to do with your personal information when you use the 121 Platform.
Where we get personal information from
We do not share any personal information with other third-parties.
Your IP-address and some information about the device and web-browser you use to access the 121 Platform.
If you have any questions regarding your privacy and the 121 Platform, feel free to contact us at:
